languages.text: "Ох, шерин... молю Великого, чтобы твое доброе сердце не было разбито черной неблагодарностью тех, кого ты привечаешь в своей свите. Лишь одно меня утешает — что эта ксенос все же чуть отлична от проклятых мерзавцев, изводящих Человечество в Просторе Коронус".

"Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Ох, шерин... молю Великого, чтобы твое доброе сердце не было разбито черной неблагодарностью тех, кого ты привечаешь в своей свите. Лишь одно меня утешает — что эта ксенос все же чуть отлична от проклятых мерзавцев, изводящих Человечество в Просторе Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned maadari that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

"Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned maadari that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

"Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: “噢，亲爱的……我向至高无上的神皇祈祷。我希望你的善意，不会给那些忘恩负义的人恩将仇报的机会。我唯一的慰藉是，这位异形和科罗努斯扩区里那群残害人类的渣滓还是有点不一样的。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “噢，亲爱的……我向至高无上的神皇祈祷。我希望你的善意，不会给那些忘恩负义的人恩将仇报的机会。我唯一的慰藉是，这位异形和科罗努斯扩区里那群残害人类的渣滓还是有点不一样的。”

languages.text: «Oh, shereen... rezo al Exaltado para que tu buen corazón no quede mancillado por la negra ingratitud de quienes aceptas en tu comitiva. Mi única consolación es que esta xenos parece algo diferente a la condenada escoria que plaga a la Humanidad en la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, shereen... rezo al Exaltado para que tu buen corazón no quede mancillado por la negra ingratitud de quienes aceptas en tu comitiva. Mi única consolación es que esta xenos parece algo diferente a la condenada escoria que plaga a la Humanidad en la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: 「あら、シャリーン…あなたを受け入れた仲間の恩を忘れて良心が壊れないことをエグザルテッド・ワンに祈ってあげるわ。唯一の救いは、この異種族はコロヌス・エクスパンスの人間に寄生するカスとはまだ違うってとこね」
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「あら、シャリーン…あなたを受け入れた仲間の恩を忘れて良心が壊れないことをエグザルテッド・ワンに祈ってあげるわ。唯一の救いは、この異種族はコロヌス・エクスパンスの人間に寄生するカスとはまだ違うってとこね」

languages.text: "Oh, Shereen ... Ich bete zum Erhabenen, dass Euer gutes Herz nicht von der schwarzen Undankbarkeit jener gebrochen wird, die Ihr in Euer Gefolge aufnehmt. Mein einziger Trost ist, dass diese Xenos sich immerhin von dem verdammten Abschaum unterscheidet, der die Menschheit in der Koronus-Ausdehnung heimsucht."
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Shereen ... Ich bete zum Erhabenen, dass Euer gutes Herz nicht von der schwarzen Undankbarkeit jener gebrochen wird, die Ihr in Euer Gefolge aufnehmt. Mein einziger Trost ist, dass diese Xenos sich immerhin von dem verdammten Abschaum unterscheidet, der die Menschheit in der Koronus-Ausdehnung heimsucht."

languages.text: « Oh, shereen... Je prie l'Exalté pour que votre bon cœur ne soit jamais brisé par l'ingratitude de ceux que vous accueillez dans votre entourage. Au moins, cette xénos est un peu différente de ces maudites vermines qui harcèlent l'humanité dans les Étendues de Koronus. Espérons que ce soit bon signe. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, shereen... Je prie l'Exalté pour que votre bon cœur ne soit jamais brisé par l'ingratitude de ceux que vous accueillez dans votre entourage. Au moins, cette xénos est un peu différente de ces maudites vermines qui harcèlent l'humanité dans les Étendues de Koronus. Espérons que ce soit bon signe. »

languages.text: "Ah şirinim, Görkemli'ye dua ederim ki o iyi kalbin, maiyetine buyur ettiklerinin nankörlüğüyle kırılmasın. Tek tesellim, bu zenonun Koronus Enginliği'nde İnsanlığın başına musallat olmuş kahrolası pisliklerden birazcık farklı olması."
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen... I pray to the Exalted One that your good heart is not broken by the black ungratefulness of those you welcome into your retinue. My only consolation is that this xenos is still a little different from the damned scum that plague Humanity in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Ah şirinim, Görkemli'ye dua ederim ki o iyi kalbin, maiyetine buyur ettiklerinin nankörlüğüyle kırılmasın. Tek tesellim, bu zenonun Koronus Enginliği'nde İnsanlığın başına musallat olmuş kahrolası pisliklerden birazcık farklı olması."
